data.name: OpenMediaVault Dark Theme
data.description:
Dark theme for OpenMediaVault 5 (the NAS operating system based on Debian)
You have to edit target domain or ip according to your needs

data.name: Syntaxxx Dark  by BamaBraves
Dark Comfort for Stylus
data.description: Dark UI theme for Stylus browser extension (Stylish alternative)

user.name: R3gi CZ
user.about:
I'm hobby amateur designer from Czech Republic. Here I would like to share UI styles for services I use a lot. I think it's better to share them than just keep them for my personal use. That's all. I hope you'll find them useful.

If you like my work, you can write me some feedback or you can by me a beer ;-)

data.name: Better Wuxiaworld
Skyscrapercity Grey
Make Archer Monospace Again
data.description: Now the editor in Berserker archer uses monospace font face, as any other normal code editor.

data.name: Zohaib Urdu Nastaleeq for all websites
data.description: By installing this style you will be able to read Urdu on all websites in Nastaleeq. If the Urdu is not viewing correctly in browser than install this style. Installed fonts are not needed.

data.name: Yandex Images Nightmode
data.description:
A nightmode style for Yandex, mostly intended to be used for the image search.
Other areas are not tested.

data.name: Hide Recommendations
data.description: Hides recommended videos from YouTube's sidebar and post-video screen
